name: TV189 - Sandstorm ( Chapter 3 )
description:
TV189 - SANDSTORM :

TV189 Sandstorm is the third installation in the renown TV189 series. In this chapter anti-goverment rebels have set up an encampment near a small desert town in utah after the TV189 virus was once again released in a biological war between America and Iraq.

Iraq dropped a bomb containing a small amount of TV189 which rapidly spread worldwide and infected most life. They are armed and dangerous, but dont forget about the zombies too!

Download for free now!
